data.text: @nosoupforgeorge Being that this virus is likely endemic, is your proposal that the entire world stay masked for all of time? There will never be zero Covid.
@nosoupforgeorge @rndulceavery Thank you! I’m so worried all the time. I don’t even want to do my Humria anymore because it seems like everyone has forgotten us.
@nosoupforgeorge Care to send me the study proving masks help stop the spread of transmission?  peer reviewed and must show causality, of course!
@nosoupforgeorge Hoping you're feeling much better now man! Sending you lots of positive vibes your way.
